title: Decentraland DAO incubated project - Meta GamiMall (+ P2E game Super Dogerio)
body:
> by 0x9b3ae2dd9eaad174cf5700420d4861a5a73a2d2a (MetaLiveStudio#2d2a)

Should the following Tier 6: up to $240,000 USD, 6 months vesting (1 month cliff) grant in the Gaming category be approved?

## Abstract

The story starts from the success of the Meta City Launch, people enjoy the experience, our displayed NFTs and our gifts, so, why not expand the idea and turn it into a place where people can play, can earn and can shop? We want to create the first one-stop GameFi integrated Mall in Decentraland and even in the whole Metaverse!!! Let users have fun and profits when shopping!!!

AND we prepared various rewards for the Decentraland user and builders & developers community! For more information about rewards, please keep reading.

For more information, please read our pitch document https://app.pitch.com/app/presentation/6ec8f5b3-1d1a-4c79-8963-1fe153878f56/5470747f-c118-4877-b341-ce2b93de0d53


## Grant size

21,999 USD

## Beneficiary address
